name: Beth Marshall
note: Beth has shown a passion for testing with great online talks. Beth is always happy to review and give feedback on ideas.

name: Maaike Brinkhof
note: Maaike's blog Journey into quality has an ongoing series: 10 years, 10 lessons.

name: Rafaela Azevedo
note: Check out Rafaela's excellent FREE course on Contract testing with PACT on the Test Automation University.

name: Marie Drake
note: Marie's excellent article on Debunking Accessibility Testing Myths covered on The Club by none other then Heather Reid and Tweeted out today by the Ministry of Testing. Well done Marie!

name: Chris McMahon
note: Thanks Chris, great insight into your Cucumber step about reverting from a destructive test.
